availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William W. Howard (Nicholas County bank clerk)

body.p: Born in 1837 in Kentucky. Bank clerk. Native of Nicholas County. Married to Margaret Fisher Howard. Children included Ida McMillian Howard and Jas F T.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850); Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, Carlisle, ED 92, p. 3; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870); U.S. Civil War Draft Registration Record; U.S., Find a Grave Index, 1600s-Current, â€œWilliam W Howard (1836-1902) https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=howard&GSfn=w&GSmn=w&GSby=1840&GSbyrel=before&GSdyrel=all&GSst=19&GScntry=4&GSob=n&GRid=119972275&df=all& (Accessed February 11, 2017).
